code: import axios from"axios";import toast from"react-hot-toast";export var sendNotification=function sendNotification(name1,name2){axios.post("http://localhost:8989/public/noti/notification",{name1:name1,name2:name2}).then(function(res){console.log(res);toast(res.data,{icon:"üëè",position:"top-center",style:{borderRadius:"10px",background:"#333",color:"#fff"}});});};
